Text.Page:
The devas continue to plunder caravans in Oblivion Woods. If we don't get caravans, we don't get supplies...or letters from home.

Hunt down {@LinkCreature:3#17#devan robbers}, {@LinkCreature:3#300161#devan chanters}, {@LinkCreature:3#300142#devan warriors}, {@LinkCreature:3#300140#bandits}, and {@LinkCreature:3#19#devan brigands}.

Report to Rhona at Bulwark Camp when you're done.
You've earned the thanks of the federation, <PCNAME>, and you showed the devas the meaning of fear.
There are still too many devas. Get back out there!
